title: DS Group plans Rs 1000 crore push in hospitality
description: The DS Group, a multi-business and FMCG corporation, plans to invest Rs 500 crore in adding three new hotels to its portfolio over the next three years. The company currently operates six hotels under global hospitality brands such as Radisson and Marriott. The new properties will be located in the north and northeastern regions of India. The investment will be funded through a combination of internal accrual and debt. The DS Group aims to achieve an annual growth of 15% in the hospitality segment over the next few years.
